metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3630 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in DjVuLibre in DJVU::DjVuTXT::decode() in DjVuText.cpp via a crafted djvu file which may lead to crash and segmentation fault. This flaw affects DjVuLibre versions prior to 3.5.28.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3630` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

djview - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djview3 - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvulibre-bin - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvulibre-desktop - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
djvuserve - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
libdjvulibre-text - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
libdjvulibre21 - 3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: djvulibre package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.27.1-14ubuntu0.1').
